metadata.name: THE PERFECT GIFT #1/10
metadata.description:
I am a gift from heaven 
above. A perfect gift! I am evidence of God's love and presence. Like the Sun rises in the morning; the world awaits my arrival. It brings to them, the feeling of hope and source of new life. I am a blessing that makes lives worthwhile, a purpose to live. By the reasons of my birth, several faces wear beautiful smiles. I bring good fortune and immeasurable happiness to door-steps. 
I am the perfect gift, every man's dream.
